description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Revocation of order published Gaz. Ex. No. 1681/9 of 22.11.2010 - Appointed Mr. S. M. S. Jayawardana as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. K. N. R. Suriyabandara and 08 others (Employees of Sri Jayawardenpura University Sri Jayawardenapura, Nugegoda)
